alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 10:49AM MST until December 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, Marias Pass, Polebridge, Flathead Lake, Flathead Valley, Mission Valley, and Polson. * WHEN...Until noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; West Glacier Region
